cast.overview: In 2035, where robots are commonplace and abide by the three laws of robotics, a technophobic cop investigates an apparent suicide. Suspecting that a robot may be responsible for the death, his investigation leads him to believe that humanity may be in danger.
cast.title: I, Robot

details.biography: Nicola Crosbie is an Actress, Meterologist, DJ and Social Content Creator. She is known for I, Robot (2004), Connie and Carla (2004) and The Dead Zone (2002). She was the chief meterologist for Global Edmonton and now is the co-host of The Morning Show on Cruz FM in Edmonton.
details.name: Nicola Crosbie
